plot: A spin-off show from Kimi ga Nozomu Eien. It's about the daily adventures of Ayu and Mayu, the two waitresses from Sky Temple and they do some comedy stuff
ending_theme: "Koi no Bakudan Date" (恋の爆弾でいと) by UYAMUYA
insert_song: "Hound Mousou" (ハウンド妄想) by Fukuyama Yoshiki (ep 6)
"Tekkumen no Uta" (テックメンの歌) by Miyauchi Takayuki (ep 6)
